comment.title: GIVE ME MORE GAMES PLEASE!
comment.text:
I want more interesting games on your site. Please add chess, go, cards and also add more competitions and funny javascript

Also I want to see a lot of animations

comment.title: Wow amaazzing!!!
comment.text:
Had so much fun playing your game and it's very cool, really! I love it!

I'm waiting for more interesting and beautiful things. Hand on guys!


P.S. add more complicated AI, it' not interesting to play with a fool!
